thread.title: Ken Spalthoff
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Ken Spalthoff

author: Ken Spalthoff
title: Ken Spalthoff
text: I just had a plumber install a new PC 1000 system last week at my Central Florida home. After the first few days there was no more smelly city water odor of chlorine. The water even feels softer in the shower but without leaving any film on you like when it's way too soft. I thought the water would taste better is my only issue but were giving the system a month to start tasting better due to the buildup of hard water deposits that are surely in our pipes. It does taste better...but not as good as bottled water does presently.
